articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: How hospitals are preparing for potential coronavirus patients
articles.description: NBC’s Steve Patterson visits a medical center in Oakland, California, where staff have prepared an entire floor to deal with a potential coronavirus outbreak. Staff are conducting drills using isolation rooms meant to contain the spread of infections.

articles.title: First person dies from coronavirus in the U.S. in Washington state
